title: Start
body:
%Randomiser: Random1
->Deny Randomness
    Denial Invalid
%Randomiser: Random2
->Accept Randomness
    Acceptance Invalid
%Randomiser: Random3
    Randomiser: 1 in 3 chance to see me!


[[CatSound]]

Quiz master: What sound does a cat make?
->Meow
    Correct! <<answer|correct>>
->Moo
    Incorrect! <<answer|incorrect>>
->Woof <<if $(canWoof) >>
    Epic Fail! <<exit>>
->No Idea [[NoIdea]]

<<if $(variablebool) >>
    Variable: $(variablebool)

<<if $(variablenumber) == 2 >>
    Variable: $(variablenumber)
